rationale: The segment contains 'low pathogenic' which is a technical term.
statement_text: The low pathogenic H5N2 influenza was also detected at two turkey farms and low pathogenic H7N6 influenza was detected at one emu farm.
The low pathogenic H5N2 influenza was also detected at two turkey farms and low pathogenic H7N6 influenza was detected at one emu farm.
